descriptionHtml:
1.2C available. Â It is separate because it can delete weapons in the basement if user
forgets to retrieve items, leave house, save.

Please RATE this mod.
Rev 1.2 No transition to the armory.
This home is for the adventurer that likes to keep her found gear and put it on display.

This is a fix and add on mod to an original mod. That mod had added modest number of mannequins,
alot of wall mounted weapon racks, a forge,smithy, sharpening wheel, crafing table, tanning rack.


Fixed: All weapon racks in the basement from the original mod.
Wall textures in basement.

You do NOT need the original mod. If you have the original mod by agoon66 please remove all items
in the basement. ALL items you care about from the mannequins, weapon racks, chests, etc.



ADDED: Basement:
Dagger racks with activators
Large display racks that use the activators
More mannequins (13 total in the basement)
More weapon racks.

Upstairs:
Dagger racks in bedroom with activators
Extra weapon rack for mages.

A few more bookshelves for the second floor.
Tweak on the door transition.

Compatibility:

To avoid the loading limitations of skyrim, and to avoid crash to desktop, you can safely add two mods at same time.
Any more will probably crash your desktop. Please see nexus forums for loading order.
I am using a mod file that allows me to load more than two mods that modify houses / towns/ cities. It is called
Skyrim Performance Mod. I have not crashed since I loaded that mod.


CREDITS: Agoon66
The NEXUS location for his file:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8286/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=8286
author: Ashenfire
